ECUACIONES DIFERENCIALES EXACTAS - Ejercicio 1

SURSO PROFE NET. [imath] \left\{\begin{array}{l}{\left(6 x y-2 y^{2}+1\right) d x+\left(3 x^{2}-4 x y\right) d y=0} \\ {y(1)=2}\end{array}\right. [/imath][imath]{\left(6 x y-2 y^{2}+1\right) d x+\left(3 x^{2}-4 x y\right) d y=0} [/imath] [imath] {y(1)=2}[/imath]
